product_name: Ruffwear Flat Out Dog Leash - 2011 Closeout
long_description: The Ruffwear Flat Out Dog Leash is an everyday leash that can be hand-held or waist-worn. Outdoor-inspired patterns connect you and your pooch with your favorite wild spaces. Strong nylon webbing has a padded handle for comfort. Handle has aluminum Talon Hook(TM) which adjusts to be hand-held, waist-worn or secured around a tree or post. Talon Clip(TM) is strong, secure and ergonomically designed for 1-handed attachment. Convenient accessory loop for pickup bags or small clip-on items. Traffic handle on the Ruffwear Flat Out Dog Leash offers quick restraint. Closeout.
short_description: The Ruffwear Flat Out Dog Leash is an everyday leash that can be hand-held or waist-worn. Outdoor-inspired patterns connect you and your pooch with your favorite wild spaces.
